comments.author: wcosta@mozilla.com
comments.text: With AWS, we can get dynamic instance provision.
comments.creator: wcosta@mozilla.com
comments.raw_text: With AWS, we can get dynamic instance provision.

comments.creator: jmaher@mozilla.com
comments.text:
dynamic provisioning will benefit the most when we have fewer instances/worker.  Either way, this will be a good move.

When we get closer to running, can we do --rebuild 5 of packet.net vs aws.metal- I want to make sure runtimes and intermittent rates are similar.
comments.raw_text:
dynamic provisioning will benefit the most when we have fewer instances/worker.  Either way, this will be a good move.
